MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH8 postcode area of Halkyn, affecting properties in Pentre Road, Windmill, and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07.26am.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 11.00. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09.03am on 14th April 2021.
